name: Tendencieros
tag_list: ecommerce, e-commerce, fashion, technology, facebook-apps, mobile-apps, runway, catwalk, design, photography, textile-industry
overview:
Tendencieros believes in fashion, trends, beauty. Believes in those who are looking for how to innovate, how to share something new with a targeted audience. Tendencieros believes that fashion is more than dressing well and consume the latest trends.

Tendencieros believes that fashion is not only those who make a product or to the wearer. Believes in an industry. A string of business where we all belong to what this wonderful world.

Tendencieros believes that everyone needs to be connected together. All of this industry involved have to have a space, a place dedicated to each of the components of the industry.

Tendencieros believes in technology and reject completely the concept of technological barriers. Believes in a single business network. Interlaced, shared and social.

Tendencieros efforts are focused on achieving and will connect the entire fashion industry. A place, a space, infinite connections, infinite growth. We want you to know, to connect, contact. Tendencieros wants to weave their own sales networks.

Tendencieros hopes to provide that space. Hopes to grow with every Fashion Brand

TENDENCIEROS company’s vision is to be the largest fashion ecosystem in Latin America.

Its main function is to bring together the entire textile industry, fashion and clothing throughout the region.
